channel.title: Unable to wrap my head around Bonds
channel.description:
I haven't really played hardcore since the release of EoC, so I am still at a loss as to what half of the new stuff is in the game.
How exactly do bonds work? I looked them up on the Grand Exchange and it says they're ~5.7 mill. Does this mean I could buy a bond, get a month of membership, and in that month of membership I could make 5.7m again and pay for another bond and keep paying for my membership through bonds, thus never paying out of pocket?

item.title: Unable to wrap my head around Bonds
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:6, topic:546598”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=665494.msg4448987#msg4448987 date=1410289921]

A bond is only 14 days of membership, but you sure can. Doing frost dragons for about 2 hours = 1 bond, so its definitely worth it if you can get over the initial investment.

Are there any other decent ways of making money anymore? I have the dg level but I don’t know if my cb stats would be adequate.

Well depending on your slayer you could try Rorarius, you can make an easy 3-4m an hour there. You need 81 slayer to kill those. You don’t really need much in terms of gear or potions either.
[/quote]
So if I had like 90 range and 81 slayer I would be able to handle them?[/quote]
Easily, soul split or deflect magic to prolong your trip.

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to wrap my head around Bonds

item.title: Unable to wrap my head around Bonds

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:3, topic:546598”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=665494.msg4448957#msg4448957 date=1410275845]
A bond is only 14 days of membership, but you sure can. Doing frost dragons for about 2 hours = 1 bond, so its definitely worth it if you can get over the initial investment.
[/quote]
Are there any other decent ways of making money anymore? I have the dg level but I don’t know if my cb stats would be adequate.[/quote]
Well depending on your slayer you could try Rorarius, you can make an easy 3-4m an hour there. You need 81 slayer to kill those. You don’t really need much in terms of gear or potions either.

item.title: Unable to wrap my head around Bonds
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:3, topic:546598”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=665494.msg4448957#msg4448957 date=1410275845]
A bond is only 14 days of membership, but you sure can. Doing frost dragons for about 2 hours = 1 bond, so its definitely worth it if you can get over the initial investment.
[/quote]
Are there any other decent ways of making money anymore? I have the dg level but I don’t know if my cb stats would be adequate.[/quote]
Any of the higher level bosses are decent, otherwise you’ll probably have to skill for most of your time to make back the money. I take back what I said about it only being a couple of hours for 1 bond. Frost bones crashed pretty hard so it will take about a half day

Read full topic
